title: kalpakAmbikE karuNai
sahitya:
kalpakAmbikE karuNai sheivAi gati vEru yArumillaiyammA shrI


anupallavi

  parpala piravi eduhhE nondEn alpa vAzhvil magizhndunnai marandhEn


caraNam    nIrkkumizhi ivvuDalin vAzhvu nilaiyAda ulagil Ehu magizhvu
shIrum shirappum un nAma bhajanattAl aDiyAr tiruk-kUTTattil cintai maravAdaruL
